cards.name: Agatha Harkness
cards.ability: Game Start: Draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

cards.name: Alioth
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy characters here.

cards.name: Colleen Wing
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your hand.

cards.name: Cosmo
cards.ability: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.

cards.name: Destroyer
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

cards.name: Enchantress
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.

cards.name: Killmonger
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy ALL 1-Cost cards.

cards.name: Lockjaw
cards.ability: Activate: After you play your next card, swap it with a card in your deck.

cards.name: Mystique
cards.ability: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing, copy its text. (if it's in play)

cards.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
cards.ability: After an enemy character is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

cards.name: Red Guardian
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power enemy card here with -2 Power and remove its text.

cards.name: Shadow King
cards.ability: On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

cards.name: Shang-Chi
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy an enemy card here that has 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Kang
cards.ability: Game Start: Replace this with 4 Kangs with text from random cards that Cost 3 or more.

cards.name: Dormammu
cards.ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

cards.name: Stardust
cards.ability: Ongoing: Cards can’t be added to locations except by playing or moving them.

cards.name: Awesome Andy
cards.ability: Activate: Give one of your cards at each other location +2 Power.

cards.name: Viv Vision
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, give all cards in your hand +1 Power if you’re winning here. Otherwise, move this to another location.

cards.name: Man-Spider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge the last card you played into this. When this merges, double its Power.

cards.name: Spider-Man Noir
cards.ability: On Reveal: If your other cards in play cost exactly 8 total, add the top card of your deck here. Set its Power to 8.

cards.name: Remote Mines
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict the 2 highest-Power enemy cards here with -2 Power.

cards.name: Web Sling
cards.ability: On Reveal: Next turn, you can move one of your cards away from here.

cards.name: Vibro-Shock Gauntlets
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give your highest-Power card here +2 Power. You get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Deafening Chord
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy character here that costs 3 or less with -1 Power and remove its text.

cards.name: Flight Harness
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give your highest-Power card here +1 Power and move it to the right.

cards.name: Hydro-Man
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set the Cost of EACH deck's top card to 1.

cards.name: Superior Spider-Man
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you have a card with increased Power in play, you get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Prowler
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 Thief’s Tools to your hand. Set their Costs to 0 if a card moved last turn.

cards.name: Spider-Punk
cards.ability: You can move this once. When this moves to a location, steal 2 Power from the highest-Power enemy there.

cards.name: Ezekiel Sims
cards.ability: After you play a card with higher Power here, give this +2 Power and move this to another location.

cards.name: Chameleon
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of another card you revealed here this turn.
